name: AVAssetDownloadConfiguration
desc: An object that provides the configuration for a download task.

items.name: init(asset: AVURLAsset, title: String)
items.desc: Creates a download configuration for a media asset.

items.name: var artworkData: Data?
items.desc: A data value that represents the assetâ€™s artwork.

items.name: var primaryContentConfiguration: AVAssetDownloadContentConfiguration
items.desc: The configuration for the primary content that the task downloads.

items.name: var auxiliaryContentConfigurations: [AVAssetDownloadContentConfiguration]
items.desc: The configuration for the auxiliary content that the task downloads.

items.name: class AVAssetDownloadContentConfiguration
items.desc: A configuration object that contains variant qualifiers and media options.

items.name: var optimizesAuxiliaryContentConfigurations: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the task optimizes auxiliary content selection.
